mapper.select: select meroom_id, meroom_name, meroom_info, meroom_status FROM meetingroom ORDER BY meroom_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO meetingroom (meroom_id, meroom_name, meroom_info, meroom_status) VALUES(MEETINGROOM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{meroom_name}, #{meroom_info}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE meetingroom SET meroom_info=#{meroom_info} WHERE meroom_id=#{meroom_id}
UPDATE meetingroom SET meroom_status=1 WHERE meroom_id=#{meroom_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO meetingroom_reservation (meroom_res_no, meroom_id, emp_no, meroom_resdate, res_starttime, res_endtime, res_content) VALUES(MEETINGROOM_RESERVATION_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{meroom_id}, #{emp_no}, TO_DATE(#{meroom_resdate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_DATE(#{res_starttime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{res_endtime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{res_content})
mapper.select: SELECT m.meroom_id, m.meroom_name, m.meroom_info, mr.meroom_res_no, e.emp_name, TO_CHAR(mr.meroom_resdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') meroom_resdate, TO_CHAR(mr.res_starttime,'HH24:MI') res_starttime, TO_CHAR(mr.res_endtime ,'HH24:MI') res_endtime, mr.res_content FROM meetingroom_reservation mr JOIN meetingroom m ON m.meroom_id=mr.meroom_id JOIN emp e ON mr.emp_no=e.emp_no WHERE meroom_res_no=#{meroom_res_no}
